forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The sun graces Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, casting a warm glow over the city’s iconic skyline. With temperatures hovering near a pleasant 65 degrees, the atmosphere feels invigorating, though a west-southwest wind dances through the streets at nearly 22 miles per hour, carrying with it the hint of the ocean. In the distance, the Golden Gate Bridge stands proudly against a backdrop of piercing blue sky, unburdened by heavy fog, though whispers of the marine layer linger around the edges, tempting the chill of evening that will soon descend.

As twilight approaches, clouds will weave into the sunset, creating a cozy ambiance with lows around 52 degrees. This shifting weather calls for layers: perhaps a light jacket to fend off the evening breeze, paired elegantly with a comfortable sweater or scarf. As this serene day transitions into night, consider a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a leisurely visit to one of the many charming cafes, where one can sip on warm coffee and watch the city’s lights twinkle against the dusky sky, making for a pleasantly quiet end to a lovely day.
